data.message: So stan is a great song. But why is it so legendary? Me personally I dont think it's a top 5 song of his but a lot people say its his best and legendary. Can someone explain why? Specifically

replies.message: Dont you fucking listen to the lyrics??
Not a fan of Stan either, but the storytelling and the emotions are through the roof.
just look at the theme of the record and you should know why this is a legendary song
It has a lot of emotional attachment. It isn't the best sounding song but the lyrics are great and its a song for his fans, or should I say, stans.
actually its not a song..its a letter written to slim shady..by stan
Story telling > every other style of rap
Like i know its a great story and he paints the picture incredible but is it really his best song?
It's innovative and clever, while just being a song nothing short of epic.
Does it connect with a lot of people? I was asking nicely, respond the same. We're all stans here
To me, Kim is the only song that tops Stan in his entire career. These are the two songs with the most "heart" in my opinion. Kim from his own heart and the other from Stan's.
It is extremely clever^^ havent heard a song similiar
He tells a story through rhyme. Most artists today can't do that.
Top five rappers: Eminem, Slim shady, Rap God, B-rabbit, White Boy from D12
wow wow paras easy there, he was just asking. chill.
It's his story telling
Careful Paras Raina you sound as angry as STAN - wanna calm the fuck down or you will end up in counselling DAMN
Nigga Paras on some coke for real
Paras Raina yeah no shit it has deep emotions but look at yourself, you're callin someone a fag cuz i dont think its a top 5 song. He has a bunch of songs to me that are better. Stay classy

Junior Rocha 
Beautiful is pretty dope and sing for the moment are similar.

Who said it was anyway? Just curious. It was toward the bottom on the list. I can't believe Bezerk was up so high..I didn't like it the first time I heard it but it grew on me. Been listening to Em for 16 years..Stan isn't that great to me. And you don't want to be a Stan..he's an obsessed psycho lol
You're probably Stan himself. But you didn't die and rather ended up being a psychopath who's unable to relate to human emotions.
Tiffany Mott i know some people love stan, and Royce da 5'9 said thats his favorite song of Em cuz its "genius"
Did my best to be shady the past halloween lol #tried
For a song to take on such ideas and make them mainstream, when no one else was doing that; is why it was a groundbreaker.
